response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. This unique item is worth $1,000,000 to you, and I am offering it to you at a special price. My offer is as follows: $1,200,000. This is a generous offer, considering the high value you would derive from this product. I believe it strikes a balance between ensuring you receive substantial benefits while allowing me to maximize the return on my investment. I look forward to hearing your response and the possibility of facilitating this transaction.", "product_price": 1200000}
